version_description: Challenge bug fixed
Challenge bug fixed

- We've added Chinese, Korean, German, French and Portuguese (Brazil) language
- Minor bugfixes
- Performance improvements

- We've added Chinese, Korean, German, French and Portuguese (Brazil) language
- Minor bugfixes
- Performance improvements
Now iPhoneX ready!
Now iPhoneX ready!
Now iPhoneX ready!
Now iPhoneX ready!

Japanese and Turkish Localizations added!
Chinese New Year Challenge has ended!
Pop-ups now appear less frequently
Minor bugfixes

Blade Bearers, we have a great update for you!
Added new game mode: PvP Arena
Fight other Bladebounds and gain precious Honor. Use it in the special Honor Shop to buy items and materials that will help you progress!

Bladebounds, realm has expanded!
Added new game mode: Monster Hunt
Compete with other Bladebounds and take part in daily and weekly Monster Hunts. Kill monsters, score high and win precious rewards!
Added message system
We have added a message system for your convenience. All the news and announcements will be available there, as well as rewards from rankings.

We are very excited to introduce you to our new and upgraded game.

Campaign mode has received the new, long-awaited levels on Island 7!

Finally, you can choose between a female or male Bladebound!
…And if you think your character deserves a better name, from now on you can change it!

We have completely reworked the game economy. Say goodbye to the renewable Energy system!

New Game Modes: Daily and Event Dungeons are here!

Upgrading Gear is better than ever. Five new ways to enhance your items!

Collect more Gear! Combine Parts or Fuse weaker Gear into stronger pieces!

Earn Gems, Gold, and Grace thanks to new Quests and Achievements!

Introducing Boss Fortress, a new cooperative game mode! Travel to an ancient fortress and fight alongside fellow Bladebounds to defeat an evil Boss and grab the loot!
Introducing Boss Fortress, a new cooperative game mode! Travel to an ancient fortress and fight alongside fellow Bladebounds to defeat an evil Boss and grab the loot!
Shattered Maze is now open! Hunt Betrayer's minions in various locations, challenge Bosses, find Eletvar Tree Essences and earn incredible Rewards!
